alert.note: Alert for Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Between 8500 And 11000 Ft; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains above 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft; Wet Mountains above 10000 Ft; Wet Mountains between 6300 and 10000Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 02 at 11:25AM MST until December 03 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 50 mph with gusts up to 75 mph possible. * WHERE...The east slopes of the Sangre De Cristo mountains and the east slopes of the Wet mountains. * WHEN...From late tonight through Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
